page.title: 20Education.
page.content: Milborne School. The Governing body consists of nine members. Two parents, One Parish Councillor, One teacher representative, four Dorset County Council appointments and the Head Teacher. There is a Friends of the School association, which helps to promote school activities, social and community functions and financial help to purchase educational items. The school is fortunate to use the swimming pool at Bovington each Wednesday, and the parents are askd to make a small contribution towards transport and hiring fees. Gymnastic and athletic awards are given. The school has recently won several awards for its environmental areas, including butterfly zone, nature trails, bird trails, tree planting, bat and bird boxes, and play areas. The present Head Master is Mr. A. Herridge.
